amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision on conflicts of interest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-29 to strike the provision on conflicts of interest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 227 (Roll no. 140).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 227 (Roll no. 140).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
